thread.title: Maha Kumbh: Chandigarh to Prayagraj bus service flagged off

author: TNN
title: Maha Kumbh: Chandigarh to Prayagraj bus service flagged off
text:
Maha Kumbh: Chandigarh to Prayagraj bus service flagged off
With pics
Chandigarh: The Chandigarh Transport Undertaking (CTU) bus service from Chandigarh to Prayagraj for Maha Kumbh began operations from ISBT-17, Chandigarh, on Thursday.
The bus service was flagged off by Diprava Lakra, secretary finance and secretary transport, UT Chandigarh administration, in the presence of Pradhuman Singh, director transport-cum-divisional manager, CTU, and other officials of the administration.
"Maha Kumbh Mela, an iconic spiritual fair in Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh, is underway and will last until Feb 26. To facilitate devotees from Chandigarh and nearby areas, CTU has started a bus service from ISBT-17, counter no. 26, to Prayagraj via Delhi, Sikandrabad, and Kanpur," said a UT spokesperson.
HVAC (heating, ventilation, and air-conditioned) buses are plying on the route. The bus fare is Rs 1,662. The one-way journey will cover 919 km, with an estimated travel time of 19.25 hours.
Apart from this, CTU is providing bus services to various religious destinations in the neighbouring states of Punjab, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Delhi, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, and Uttarakhand. The bus services are operating to various religious destinations like Ayodhya Dham, Salasar, Khatu Shyam, Vrindavan, Haridwar, Katra, Jwala Ji, and Chamunda Devi.
BOX
THE SCHEDULE
Departure: 12:00 hrs (daily)
Arrival at Prayagraj, Nehru Park: 07:25 hrs (next day)
Departure from Prayagraj: 17:00 hrs (daily)
Arrival time: 12:25 hrs (next day) at ISBT-17, Chandigarh
Online booking of seats until Feb 25 is available on https://ctuonline.chd.gov.in, https://chdctu.gov.in, http://www.redbus.in/, and CTU Musafir app.
